Class PlotDAO

java.lang.Object
project.utilities.PlotDAO
public class PlotDAO
extends java.lang.Object
This is the PlotDAO that connects to the Plot Database

    • produceYieldAndWiltChecker

      public static boolean produceYieldAndWiltChecker​(Plot plot)
      Check if the crop planted on a plot should have any produce. If yes, call a method to generate its produce and update in DB. Also checks if the method should have wilted via a different method and returns that result.
      Parameters:
      Plot - object to check
      Returns:
      whether the crop on plot has wilted

    • checkIfPlotCountNeedsUpdating

      public static void checkIfPlotCountNeedsUpdating​(UserProfile user)
      Checks if Plot count needs updating and update his plots if it does.
      Parameters:
      user - UserProfile who needs to be checked
